criteria.name: Picture Quality
criteria.description: Measures resolution, contrast, color accuracy, and HDR support.

criteria.name: Sound Quality
criteria.description: Evaluates speaker clarity, bass, and surround sound support.

criteria.name: Smart App Support
criteria.description: Assesses streaming app availability and smart interface performance.

criteria.name: Gaming Performance
criteria.description: Evaluates input lag, refresh rate, HDMI 2.1, and responsiveness.

criteria.name: Movie Watching Experience
criteria.description: Focuses on cinematic modes, ambient lighting, and motion handling.

criteria.name: Ease of Use
criteria.description: Considers interface intuitiveness, remote design, and setup.

criteria.name: Family-Friendly Features
criteria.description: Includes parental controls, kid-safe modes, and multi-user profiles.

criteria.name: Design & Aesthetics
criteria.description: Evaluates how well the TV fits into a shared space visually.

criteria.name: Price/Value
criteria.description: Assesses value for features and performance relative to cost.
